item.body: sandeep wagl buy call target rs stop loss rs .

Of the many reasons that Rata Tata remained compassionate to the very end of his tenure as Chairman of Tata Sons was because he was single and loved his dogs. Obama loves his dog too, even though he wishes he was single given that Michelle is such a handful. The essence of being single for any man is to have a pet. There are many reasons: You will never need to bribe a pet or be told that the credit limit is too low. Pets complete the single man. They give him a reason to smile, and are loving and non-judgmental. Qualities you will never find in a woman, no matter how giving she is. They are not there to be patted or stroked; they are our friends. I have many long conversations with my dog Google, who was made famous thanks to the Radia tapes, for which I shall be eternally grateful to Niraa Radia and the CBI. Google my dog is better than Google the search engine; he doesn't throw up unwanted stuff in front of me. He knows I hate being disturbed during my afternoon siesta, while reading The Economic Times or watching The Newshour. He lets me be. They are lazy, chilled out and don't give a toss about who's visiting. Just like most single men are. My dog Google loves every guest of mine. There's always an extra lick for the ladies — he has been trained well. Don't try the Punjabi route by calling your dog Sukhvinder, Rajveer or Bhupinder. Keep it simple. If you want to be cerebral, call him Pablo, Subodh or Souza. If you want him to be associated with glamour, call him Brad, Pitt or even Caprio. But certainly not Dharmendra or Poonam. If you don't have one, women think you're selfish and a brooder. A dog lends you personality. For God's sake, don't keep snakes, cats and rabbits. They are a nuisance. Never keep ferocious dogs who keep barking all the time. How will you seduce the woman into listening to Cohen when all she can hear is some wretched barking? Finally, look after your pets well. Share the same after-shave. Make sure they are well-groomed. Take them for walks in parks which are infested with single women — they make great conversation starters. Women love single men with pets. Besides, pets will never divorce you and take half your well-earned wealth. So what's the worry.
